channel.title: POST on Mart Jürisoo
channel.description: Recent content in POST on Mart Jürisoo

item.title: Tracking The UFC PPV Sales
item.description: (Click for bigger) With UFC moving their pay-per-view events exclusively behind ESPN's paywall in 2019 and thus ending any access to accurate sales numbers, it'd be a fitting time to look back at the numbers for the whole run. The biggest PPV events are highlighted by text and color-grouped by the star fighter: Conor McGregor, Ronda Rousey, Brock Lesnar, Georges St. Pierre, and Jon Jones. The vertical dotted line marks the sell of UFC to WMG-IMG.

item.title: Fantasy Basketball Correlation Matrix
item.description: The matrix is based on the 2019-20 NBA season's per-game standard scores of the top 200 players. This could be used as a guide for possible puting strategies. There are many players with non-standard statistical contributions, however it might be a good idea to keep within stardard lines to have the biggest potential player-base and to minimize categorical waste. The players can be divided into 3 main groups: ft-fg3m-pts-ast-stl blk-reb-fg tov Based on actual basketball roles, the first two groups are smalls and bigs.
